憑む: (たのむ) - to request/to beg/to ask; to call/to order/to reserve; to entrust to; (esp. 恃む) to rely on
憑代: (よりしろ) - object representative of a divine spirit; object to which a spirit is drawn or summoned; object or animal occupied by a kami
憑依: (ひょうい) - dependence/depending on; possession (by a spirit, etc.)
憑坐: (よりまし) - child or doll used as a vessel for a spirit invoked by a shaman or miko
憑子: (よりまし) - child or doll used as a vessel for a spirit invoked by a shaman or miko
憚りながら: (はばかりながら) - with all due respect ...; I venture to say ...; Excuse me, but ...
憚り乍ら: (はばかりながら) - with all due respect ...; I venture to say ...; Excuse me, but ...
憚り様: (はばかりさん) - thank you for your trouble; unfortunately ...
憚る: (はばかる) - to hesitate/to have scruples/to be afraid of what others may think; to lord it over/to have great influence
憤る: (むずかる) - to fret; to be fretful; to be peevish
憤ろしい: (いきどおろしい) - irritated; angry; furious
憤怒: (ふんど) - anger; rage; resentment; indignation; exasperation
憤悶: (ふんもん) - anger; resentment; indignation; chagrin; irritation
憤懣: (ふんまん) - anger; resentment; indignation; chagrin; irritation
憤死: (ふんし) - dying in a fit of anger or indignation
憤然: (ふんぜん) - anger; indignation; rage; wrath
憤青: (ふんせい) - fenqing; leftist Chinese youth (usu. nationalistic)
憧れの的: (あこがれのまと) - object of adoration, longing
憧れる: (akogareru) - anseiar por, desejar ardentemente, admirar, sentir-se atraído por
憧憬れる: (あこがれる) - to long for; to yearn after; to admire; to be attracted by
憩いの場: (いこいのば) - place for relaxation and refreshment
憩う: (いこう) - to rest; to relax; to repose
憫察: (びんさつ) - taking pity upon; sympathy; compassion
憫然: (びんぜん) - pitiable; pitiful; piteous; sorry; sad
憬れる: (あこがれる) - to long for; to yearn after; to admire; to be attracted by
憲兵隊: (けんぺいたい) - regiment of military policemen
憲法上の権利: (けんぽうじょうのけんり) - constitutional right; constitutional rights
憲法十七条: (けんぽうじゅうしちじょう) - Seventeen-Article Constitution (of Asuka-period Japan)
憲法学: (けんぽうがく) - (study of) constitutional law
憲法学者: (けんぽうがくしゃ) - constitutional scholar (lawyer); expert in constitutional law
憲法改正: (けんぽうかいせい) - constitutional reform; constitutional amendment
憲法裁判所: (けんぽうさいばんしょ) - constitutional court
憲法解釈: (けんぽうかいしゃく) - constitutional interpretation
憲法記念日: (けんぽうきねんび) - Constitution Memorial Day Holiday (May 3rd)
憶う: (おもう) - (想う has connotations of heart-felt) to think/to consider/to believe; to think (of doing)/to plan (to do); to judge/to assess/to regard; to imagine/to suppose/to dream; to expect/to look forward to; to feel/to desire/to want; to recall/to remember
憶える: (おぼえる) - to memorize/to memorise/to commit to memory/to learn by heart/to bear in mind/to remember; (覚える only) to learn/to pick up/to acquire; (覚える only) to feel; (覚える only) to think/to regard
憶念: (おくねん) - something one always remembers
憶断: (おくだん) - jumping to hasty conclusions; conjecture
憶説: (おくせつ) - hypothesis; speculation; surmise; conjecture
憾み: (うらみ) - resentment/grudge/malice/bitterness; (esp. 憾み) matter for regret/regret
憾む: (うらむ) - to resent/to curse/to feel bitter/to blame/to bear a grudge; (esp. 憾む) to regret
憾むらくは: (うらむらくは) - I regret that; I feel terrible but; I'm sorry but
懇ろ: (ねもころ) - kind/courteous/hospitable/warmly respectful; intimate; becoming intimate/having an intimate relationship (sometimes esp. a homosexual relationship)
懇ろになる: (ねんごろになる) - to become intimate with (e.g. a woman); to become acquainted
懇切丁寧: (こんせつていねい) - (an explanation, advice, etc. being) kind, careful, and thorough
懇意になる: (こんいになる) - to get (become) acquainted; to get to know; to get (become) intimate with; to become friendly with; to become friends
懇望: (こんぼう) - entreaty; solicitation; earnest request
懇親会: (こんしんかい) - friendly reunion; get-together
懇談会: (こんだんかい) - social gathering/informal get-together; colloquium/panel discussion
應需: (おうじゅ) - responding to a demand; answering a request
